Desc.entry: All aspects of model boating except I.C. (internal combustion) boats. Holds model yacht and scale competitions throughout the year. Established in 1937 the club has its own building onsite. New members are always welcome, open to all ages, with experienced members always on hand to offer advice. Caters for people with disabilities.

ProvisionDaysAndTimes.entry: Usually meets Sunday and Thursday mornings, please contact for details
